```{r loadData}
source(file = "../src/sc01_data.R")
folder_path = "../input/data"

# Education
df_education <- read_csv(file.path(folder_path, "education.csv"))

# Experience
df_experience <- read_csv(file.path(folder_path, "experience.csv"))

# Accomplishments
df_accomplishments <- read_csv(file.path(folder_path, "accomplishments.csv"))

# Projects
df_projects <- read_csv(file.path(folder_path, "projects.csv"))

# Skills
df_skills <- read_csv(file.path(folder_path, "skills.csv"))
```

# Experience
```{r experience}
df_experience %>% 
  filter(startYear >= 2015) %>%
  detailed_entries(
  with = title,
  what = unit,
  why = detail,
  when = glue::glue("{startMonth} {startYear} --> {endMonth} {endYear}",.na = ""),
  where = where
  )

```

# Education
```{r education}
# Merge joint PhD entries
df_education %>%
  # filter(startYear == 2012) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    with = inst,
    what = degree,
    why = detail,
    when = glue::glue("{startMonth} {startYear} --> {endMonth} {endYear}",.na = ""),

  )
```

# Selected Projects
```{r projects}
df_projects %>%
  filter(year > 2018) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    with = area,
    what = accomplishment,
    why = detail,
    when = year,
    where = where,
    .protect = FALSE
  )
```

# Data Science Skills
```{r skills}
df_skills %>%
  filter(area != "Environments" &
           area != "Communication") %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    with = area,
    what = skills
  )
```
